## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0fbf998b1c11f6a785806e2ab4f0bbbc4da9a95e803f643a497d41215484a11d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'invalid-polyfill-boundary' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
